original_text: Mordecai discovered what Haman had done. He tore his clothes and he dressed in sackcloth and ashes, because he was very upset. He went into the city. He cried and he wept loudly as he went.
korean_text: 모르드개가 이 모든 일을 알고 자기의 옷을 찢고 굵은 베 옷을 입고 재를 뒤집어쓰고 성중에 나가서 대성 통곡하며
